SqlOperation.Name: GetAll
GetAllExtended
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT s.*, w.Name as WorkspaceName FROM `sec_secrets` s INNER JOIN `wspc_workspaces` w ON s.WorkspaceId = w.Id WHERE s.`WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId ORDER BY s.`Name` ASC;

SqlOperation.Name: CountAll
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT COUNT(Id) as Count FROM `sec_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId;

SqlOperation.Name: Create
UpdateById
SqlOperation.TextCommand:
UPDATE `sec_secrets` SET `Name` = @Name, `Description` = @Description, `Disabled` = @Disabled WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `Id` = @Id;
SELECT * FROM `sec_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `Id` = @Id;

SqlOperation.Name: UpdateValueById
SqlOperation.TextCommand:
UPDATE `sec_secrets` SET `Encrypted` = @Encrypted, `Value` = @Value WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `Id` = @Id;
SELECT * FROM `sec_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `Id` = @Id;

SqlOperation.Name: DeleteById
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT * FROM `sec_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `Id` = @Id; DELETE FROM `sec_secrets` WHERE `WorkspaceId` = @WorkspaceId AND `Id` = @Id;
